data.name: Steel Division 2 - History Pass
data.detailed_description:
Expand Steel Division 2’s History through 3 additional DLC featuring famous campaigns, divisions, nations and units! Releasing during the year following the game’s release, these History Packs feature:

  • 3 Dynamic Strategic Campaigns
  • Historical missions, playable in solo and coop
  • 12 Divisions
  • New nations
  • 6 new Aces
  • New units
  • 30 camos

Beyond Steel Division 2

Explore more History through 3 gigantic exciting Dynamic Strategic Campaigns, featuring new nations & hundreds of new battalions to lead to victory in the highly-replayable Turn-based Army General mode.

Extend your tactical possibilities with 12 new historically-accurate Divisions and dozens of never-seen-before, highly-detailed units! Customize your troops with 30 gorgeous camos and field one of the 6 new available aces!

Play in solo or in coop mode in the new Historical Missions picturing real-life tactical operations!

data.short_description: Expand Steel Division 2’s History through 3 additional DLC featuring famous campaigns, divisions, nations, units, and more!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
data.legal_notice: Developed and published by Eugen Systems.
